summary: Hyperscalers (Meta, Microsoft, Google, AWS) are aggressively increasing AI infrastructure investments, with Meta raising its 2024 capex forecast to $35-40B. GPU rental prices remain stable at $3.16/hr, reflecting sustained demand. New model releases (GPT-4o, Claude 3, Llama 3) and rumors of GPT-5/Gemini Ultra further drive market optimism.
